alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 3:45PM EST until February 26 at 11:17AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Ohio, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 300 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding continues on the Little Muskingum River, with the water still rising. Flooding can also be expected along streams and creeks that run into the Little Muskingum River from backwater. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 342 PM EST, Flooding is ongoing along the Little Muskingum River. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Washington County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
